data:item.name: lpc55s16-qei-interface-by-ezh
data:item.display_title: EZH implements Quad encoder function in lpc5516
data:item.overview: This demo introduces a method to implement two input quad encoder function by using EZH in LPC55.EZH, as a co-processor of LPC55, can quickly access IO. For mechanical repetitive tasks like Quad encoder(QEI) signal scan. EZH detect the level and edge changing of phase A and phase B, then calculate the direction and index.
